short_summary: HR and OSS policy development, Review of policy suite through lens of mental health, accessibility, diversity and inclusion.
description: The Office of the Auditor General of Canada requires the services of a Contractor to complete a review of the OAG’s Human Resources (HR) and Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) Policy Suite, including policies, directives, guidelines as well as terms and terms and conditions of employment and tools through the lens of mental health, accessibility, diversity and inclusion and Gender-based Analysis Plus (GBA+)
